descr.p: Provides a 'caps.txt' configuration, used by some Gopher clients to determine characteristics about the server.
Simply include it in your server application. The TGopherCapsAction class is registered to 'caps.txt' and responds appropriately.

element.name: TGopherCaps.Expire
element.short: How long clients should cache caps.txt

descr.p: Set this property to the number of seconds that clients should keep a cached copy of the caps.txt file generated by this action.
